meanings.definition: A diuretic drug used to treat fluid retention.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed furosemide to help reduce swelling in my legs.
meanings.sent2: She takes furosemide every day to manage her water retention.
meanings.sent3: After taking furosemide, I felt like a deflating balloon!
meanings.sent4: The furosemide worked like a drain, flushing out excess water from my body.
meanings.sent5: The furosemide acted like a sponge, soaking up the extra fluids in my system.
